Lines 6 -7 refer to the copyright notice above those lines, not to this.  Are we intentionally granting the right to remove our copyright notice?
should copyright notice be above license?
should copyright notice be above license?
Why not break on all of these?  ch can't simultaneously be W and some other value.  Since both result in correct code, I guess "consistency with upstream" is a fine answer.
